roleset.name: scornful
roleset.note: CONTEMPTUOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from contemptuous.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Even many people who-1 [*-1] are contemptuous of other people even regard bears as their most intimate friends -- whoever touches a hair of a bear , he gives the cold shoulder to you .
